name: The Last Tater
description:
As a little fried tater you must survive as earth turns apocalyptic. Make a few helpful friends along the way as you upgrade your gun and abilities to defeat all kinds of evil creatures that want to eat you.

  • Upgrade your gun and player attributes
  • Find useful special abilities
  • Survive the onslaught as enemies become more and more difficult
  • Join the French fry resistance against alien invaders
  • Learn valuable life lessons (your mileage may vary)

YouTube Let's Play/Reviewers: Feel free to use The Last Tater gameplay in your online monetized videos.
